name: Reap
description:
your ship breaks up on the rocky shores,
but luckily you've made it to the island

every action tires you, but the sleep
you get brings with it a return of energy

there is plenty of fresh water, but if you
don't eat you will quickly starve to death

some of the turnips on board washed up on shore,
but they're in limited supply unless you plant and grow them

when the ship crashed, you watched your
treasure map tear and scatter to the wind

a game by daniel linssen
made for ludum dare 34
